Segment.name: EI
Segment.comment: To identify individual equipment and its sequence number for automatic identification

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: EquipmentOrientationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the direction the equipment is entrained or the lading is loaded; When used to indicate the lading orientation, direction is defined relative to the equipment on which it is loaded

Field.name: Position
Field.comment: Relative position of shipment in car, trailer, or container (mutually defined)

Field.name: TagStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of an Automatic Equipment Identification Tag

SyntaxNote.name: P0203
SyntaxNote.comment: If either EI02 or EI03 is present, then the other is required.
